location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.2751 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jones’s earlier letters, relating to an incident of piracy and plunder of a vessel’s cargo at Sharjah. Anderson writes that the Government anticipates further updates on proceedings, and states that the Magistrate of Police in Bombay is to obtain from the shipwrecked vessel’s owner a list the cargo that was plundered.
